abstract: The former Home Depot and Chrysler chief is assuming yet another job on behalf of Cerberus, taking over the parent company of Remington Arms and Bushmaster Firearms.
snippet: The former Home Depot and Chrysler chief is assuming yet another job on behalf of Cerberus, taking over the parent company of Remington Arms and Bushmaster Firearms.
lead_paragraph: Robert L. Nardelli has taken the helm of yet another portfolio company of Cerberus Capital Management, assuming on Friday the role of head of the gun maker Freedom Group‘s newly created office of the chief executive.

headline.main: Cerberus’s Freedom Names Nardelli as Chief

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
